sentences.sContent: ...In sum: generous family-friendly policies do keep more women in the labor market...
...where six school districts used generous state grants to set up separate boys' and girls' academies in the late 1990s...
...opposition was strongest in states with both high numbers of immigrants and relatively generous social services...

synos.tran: 慷慨的，大方的；宽宏大量的；有雅量的

remMethod.val: gener(产生) ＋ ous(…的) → 产生很多的 → 大量的

trans.tranCn: 慷慨的， 宽厚的； 大量的
trans.tranOther: someone who is generous is willing to give money, spend time etc, in order to help people or give them pleasure
